snippet.title: The Norwood Suite - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now on STEAM, Humble Store and Itch.io:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/696480/The_Norwood_Suite/
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/the-norwood-suite
https://cosmoddd.itch.io/the-norwood-suite

From Cosmo D, the creator of "Off-Peak", comes something entirely...different.

The Norwood Suite

The Norwood Suite takes players to the secluded Hotel Norwood on a simple package delivery that quickly unfolds into something much more. Filled with bizarre characters and objects, this mysterious resort is a dense, open-ended world teeming with hidden passages and secrets to discover.
 
Peer into the lives of the hotel’s guests and staff, explore and interact with surprises behind every door, and piece together a non-linear narrative that rewards your curiosity. The Norwood Suite features surreal art design, as well as an original atmospheric score, composed by Cosmo D, that’s integrated directly into the game world.
 
Set in the same dreamlike universe as Cosmo D’s debut cult-hit, Off-Peak, The Norwood Suite is something that needs to be experienced to be described.

Developed by Cosmo D Studios
http://cosmodmusic.com/the-norwood-suite-presskit/sheet.php?p=the_norwood_suite#images
https://twitter.com/cosmoddd

Published by Alliance Digital Media
http://alliancedigitalmedia.com/
https://twitter.com/wemakegames
https://www.facebook.com/AllianceDigitalMedia/
